column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Our staff have been trained to respond to any and all allergy queries
column2: and we have information sheets readily available to them for review if they forget. And since we serve several hundred guests daily
column3: we do often rely on our guests to inform their servers of this vital information prior to ordering. Thank you again for bringing this matter to our attention
column4: and please let us know if we can be of further assistance.
